q: Dwaine Caraway -- who'd take the reins should Mayor Tom step down before the May election-- is seen presenting a key to the city of Dallas to Philadelphia Eagles QB Michael Vick at some Super Bowl party. Let me say this, in short: With me, with me, it's simply and only about the children, Dwaine Caraway tells Unfair Park this morning, referring to the fact the downtown event was filled with "wayward kids." Defense Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates will soon lift the ban on initiating new cases against Guantanamo detainees in preparation to increase the use of military commissions for prosecution. Imposed on the day of Barack Obama 's inauguration, the overturned ban will be accompanied by "an executive order to create a parole board-like system" to review cases of nearly 50 detainees who would be held without trial.
